contents:
求翻译这段英语
Anyone who's got a little common sense would see, that if our metal-vehicle continues to move ahead, can this mantis-arm-stopping-chariot scoundrel block our way?
Just as the opposite to what some of the western media had been boasting of, it just showed that our army had kept the greatest limitation of restrain!
